mapper.insert: INSERT INTO survey(sulno, askcontent , sulgroupname, sulstate ) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(sulno), 0) + 1 as sulno FROM survey), #{askcontent}, #{sulgroupname}, #{sulstate})
mapper.select: select survey.sulno, sulmunr.sulmunrno, survey.askcontent, sulmunr.chono, sulmunr.chocontent from survey join sulmunr on survey.sulno = sulmunr.sulno where survey.sulgroupname = #{sulgroupname} order by survey.sulno , sulmunr.chono

select sulno, askcontent, chono, chocontent, thenumber, ratio_to_report(thenumber) over(partition by sulno) * 100 as theratio from( select survey.sulno, max(survey.askcontent) as askcontent, max(sulmunr.chono)as chono, sulmunr.chocontent, count(sulconfirm.selno) as thenumber from survey join sulconfirm on survey.sulno = sulconfirm.sulno join sulmunr on sulconfirm.selno = sulmunr.chono and survey.sulno = sulmunr.sulno where survey.sulgroupname = #{sulgroupname} group by survey.sulno, sulconfirm.selno, sulmunr.chocontent order by survey.sulno )

select count(*) from survey
askcontent LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
